subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Phil Hughes, 21, looked a little young and a lot overmatched as he gave up two homers before being booed off the mound in the fourth inning in a loss to Detroit on Tuesday.
snippet: Phil Hughes, 21, looked a little young and a lot overmatched as he gave up two homers before being booed off the mound in the fourth inning in a loss to Detroit on Tuesday.
